member.name: T:Wanderer.Library.Common.BindableObject
member.summary: Implements the interface and exposes a method for derived classes to raise the event. The event arguments created by this class are cached to prevent managed heap fragmentation.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.BindableObject.#cctor
member.summary: Static constructor.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.BindableObject.#ctor
member.summary: Default constructor.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.BindableObject.GetPropertyChangedEventArgs(System.String)
member.summary: Returns an instance of for the specified property name.
member.param: The name of the property to create event args for.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.BindableObject.AfterPropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Derived classes can override this method to execute logic after a property is set. The base implementation does nothing.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.BindableObject.RaisePropertyChanged(System.String)
member.summary: Attempts to raise the event, and invokes the virtual method, regardless of whether the event was raised or not.

member.name: E:Wanderer.Library.Common.BindableObject.PropertyChanged
member.summary: Occurs when a property value changes.

member.name: T:Wanderer.Library.Common.Collections.Generic.InvariantCultureIgnoreCaseStringComparer
member.summary: Implement for strings with option.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.Collections.Generic.InvariantCultureIgnoreCaseStringComparer.Compare(System.String,System.String)
member.summary: Compares two strings and returns a value indicating whether one is less than, equal to, or greater than the other.
member.returns: a signed integer that indicates the relative values of x and y

member.name: T:Wanderer.Library.Common.DisposeAction
member.summary: Helper class for using interface.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.DisposeAction.Dispose
member.summary: Performs application-defined tasks associated with freeing, releasing, or resetting unmanaged resource.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.DisposeAction.#ctor(System.Action)
member.summary: Constructor.
member.param: action that should be called in method

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.DisposeAction.Finalize
member.summary: Finalizer.

member.name: T:Wanderer.Library.Common.EnvironmentEx
member.summary: Provides additional information and methods to class.

member.name: F:Wanderer.Library.Common.EnvironmentEx.ServicePackNumberVariableName
member.summary: Variable name for operating system service pack version number.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.EnvironmentEx.ExpandEnvironmentVariables(System.String)
member.summary: Replaces the name of each environment variable embedded in the specified string with the string equivalent of the value of the variable, then returns the resulting string.
member.param: a string containing the names of zero or more environment variables; each environment variable is quoted with the percent sign character (%)
member.returns: a string with each environment variable replaced by its value

member.name: T:Wanderer.Library.Common.OperatingSystemEx
member.summary: Represents information about an operating system, such as the version and platform identifier.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.OperatingSystemEx.#ctor(System.PlatformID,System.Version,System.String,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class, using the specified platform identifier value, version object and service pack string.
member.param: one of the values that indicates the operating system platform
a object that indicates the version of the operating system
a value which determines whether the operating system is a 64-bit operating system.

member.name: M:Wanderer.Library.Common.OperatingSystemEx.ToString
member.summary: Converts the value of this object to its equivalent string representation.
member.returns: the string representation of the values returned by the , and properties

member.name: P:Wanderer.Library.Common.OperatingSystemEx.Platform
member.summary: Gets a enumeration value that identifies the operating system platform.

member.name: P:Wanderer.Library.Common.OperatingSystemEx.Version
member.summary: Gets a object that identifies the operating system.
member.returns: a object that describes the major version, minor version, build, and revision numbers for the operating system

member.name: P:Wanderer.Library.Common.OperatingSystemEx.ServicePack
member.summary: Gets the service pack version represented by this object.
member.returns: the service pack version, if service packs are supported and at least one is installed; otherwise, an empty string ("")

member.name: P:Wanderer.Library.Common.OperatingSystemEx.Is64BitPlatform
member.summary: Determines whether the operating system is a 64-bit operating system.

member.name: P:Wanderer.Library.Common.OperatingSystemEx.VersionString
member.summary: Gets the concatenated string representation of the platform identifier, version, and service pack that are currently installed on the operating system.
member.returns: the string representation of the values returned by the , and properties
